inclusion.criterion: pregnant women (aged 18 - 45 years) before 14 weeks of gestation, with autoimmune thyroid
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All SLE (Systemic Lupus Erythematosus) pregnant women (aged 18 - 45 years) before 14 weeks of gestation, with autoimmune thyroid antibodies
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) patients already on levothyroxine.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Those patients discovered to be hypothyroid who need levothyroxine as part of standard of care
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is taking Levothyroxine. Her symptoms improved significantly after starting treatment.
